captions.text:
♪ I grew up
in an American town ♪

♪ No locks on the doors
when we all bedded down ♪

♪ Met a pretty young girl
and made her my bride ♪

♪ After church on Sundays,
take the kids for a ride ♪

♪ Swimming holes,
catching fireflies in jars ♪

♪ Spend the evening
staring at the stars ♪

♪ And they made
all the kids ♪

♪ When they announced it
on TV ♪

♪ jumped in my truck
and slammed reverse ♪
♪ I had to get to my family

♪ before the gay
could get there first ♪

♪ In my throat
I could feel my heart ♪

♪ I didn't know
how much time I had ♪

♪ before all the orgies
would start ♪

♪ And they're grabbing
guys like me ♪

♪ and they're pulling us
out of our trucks ♪

♪ and they're kissing our lips
and nibbling our ears ♪

♪ and all sorts
of sexy stuff ♪

♪ And they're taking us out
to fancy hotels ♪

♪ And they're saying how good
we look in their shirt ♪

♪ when we wake up
the next day ♪
♪ No, I dare not look back

♪ but as strong and straight
as I know I am ♪

♪ every man
can be pushed too far ♪

♪ and the devil
looks like Mario Lopez ♪

♪ in jean shorts
washing his car ♪

♪ I pulled up
into my house ♪

♪ but I felt no love
when I looked in her eyes ♪

♪ and I didn't make it
in time ♪

♪ Been in this bunker
three longs years ♪
♪ Yet I shudder when I think

♪ about what must be
happening out there ♪

♪ with scary tattoos
and muscly arms ♪

♪ blue eyes
and super cute bangs ♪

♪ So I'll seal myself off
from everyone ♪
♪ and hide here until I die

♪ confused and angry,
sad and alone ♪
♪ and I know the reason why

title: Trevor Moore: High in Church - "Gays Got Married"

comments.text:
There is a notable homosexual group, consisting of thousands of members, 
known as the North American Man and Boy Love Association (NAMBLA). This is 
a child molesting homosexual group whose cry is "SEX BEFORE 8 BEFORE IT'S 
TOO LATE." This group can be seen marching in most major homosexual parades 
across the United States.

Homosexuals commit more than 33% of all reported child molestations in the 
United States, which, assuming homosexuals make up 2% of the population, 
means that 1 in 20 homosexuals is a child molestor, while 1 in 490 
heterosexuals is a child molestor. (Psychological Reports, 1986, 58, pp. 
327-37)

The Kinsey study of 1948, which homosexuals often cite to say that 10% of 
the population is homosexual, actually says that only 4% of the population 
is exclusively homosexual. This study involved a disproportionate number of 
people who had been in jail for sex crimes (hardly a random sample of the 
population). Kinsey also did perverse studies involving young boys and 
pedophiles.

Because homosexuals can't reproduce naturally, they resort to recruiting 
children. Homosexuals can be heard chanting "TEN PERCENT IS NOT ENOUGH, 
RECRUIT, RECRUIT, RECRUIT" in their homosexual parades. A group called the 
"Lesbian Avengers" prides itself on trying to recruit young girls. They 
print "WE RECRUIT" on their literature. Some other homosexuals aren't as 
overt about this, but rather try to infiltrate society and get into 
positions where they will have access to the malleable minds of young 
children (e.g., the clergy, teachers, Boy Scout leaders, etc.)  See the DC 
Lesbian Avengers web page, and DC Lesbian Avengers Press Release, where 
they threaten to recruit little boys and girls.   (Fields, Dr. E. "Is 
Homosexual Activity Normal?" Marietta, GA.)

More fun and real facts WITH references here!

comments.text:
I'm surprised I don't see any hate comments in this comment section from 
homosexuals calling Trevor a "homophobe", or something, just because the 
song makes fun of them.

I don't have a problem with homosexuals, if they want to marry, fine, but 
everything else, some people actually question them, with good reasons, 
like the homosexual kids part, which I'm surprised they were able to show, 
kids shouldn't know that stuff until they're older, and this video pretty 
much sums it all up, that homosexuality is getting shown in all types of 
media now. That's kinda fine for them, but at the same time, it *will* 
affect others, and,it really isn't normal. Some say homosexuality won't 
affect anyone, but for starters, it'll damn well affect kids.

I just know the hate replies are coming my way, just because I have a 
different opinion.﻿

comments.author: Vomitas13

comments.text:
^ So natural that homosexuality exists in the animal kingdom elsewhere, 
too. Are those animals also unnatural and not normal?

You can cop out with "because God said so" like many other dopes, but I 
think you should read some philosophy literature and question yourself on 
"normal" and exactly why human society shouldn't have the authority to 
command "normality" with love and sexuality.

These are foundational mechanisms, bonding with other members of our 
species. For any government to regulate that is immoral, to exclude lovers 
it deems illegitimate from participating (joint taxes, other benefits of 
marriage, recognition) is discrimination.

Creating a problem where there shouldn't be one. 

But I digress. I'm not worked up at all or bothered by your comment. Your 
opinion is an entitlement, no matter how dumb, and also one of a quickly 
growing minority. In part, this is because it is ill-informed and 
inherently inhumane. It will lose in the end. 

But that's what you get for thinking you can judge people where your own 
God told you that you shouldn't. ;) (Unless you're not a Christian bigot 
and just an asshole. In which case, eh. Troll on, brah.)

comments.text:
+TheGameKeeper94 "Here in the U.S., people make a big deal about people 
coming out and saying they're homosexual, you don't see the rest of us 
coming out and saying we're straight" 

That's because it's sort of taken for granted that "straight" is the 
default. You don't come out because you're out simply by virtue of 
existing, because heterosexuality is culturally considered the norm. 

That's like asking why straight people don't get a Pride parade. Why? 
Because every other parade is a Straight Pride parade.

Or why don't we have a White History month? Because the other 11 months are 
already White History month.
comments.author: ometta7

comments.text:
+Randy Rogers
Where can I start with this? You're actually ok with homosexuality 
affecting kids? You're ok with kids being easily influenced by that? If so, 
Idk what to say.

And this "Straight propaganda" you speak of, is completely fine & normal, 
if homosexuals don't like it, its not our fault, its theirs. Especially 
when it comes to love music, of course its about straight relationship, 
always has been. No one wants to heat some love song about 2 dudes.  You 
want to bring up Disney princesses? Have you seen Brave? Merida isn't 
exactly girly, and she didn't have no love interest in the film at all. 
What about Mulan, Pocahontas & Princess and the Frog? Sure, the main 
characters in those 3 films arent really princesses, but you get my point, 
they're not girly either. Talk about outdated. Same for the knight thing, 
have you seen recent films like DragonHeart 3, the knight, who isnt really 
a knight until the end of the film, his love interest isn't some regular 
fair maiden, its a woman who can kick ass.

You even bring up the "what if you see a straight couple in public" crap? 
No, I wouldn't have a problem with that at all, but excuse me if I can't 
say the same if I ever see two dudes in public.

It is unfortunate that homosexuality in so punishable in other countries, 
but I'm just saying, do you think that unfortunate stuff would happen to 
certain people if they kept their business to themselves? Here in the U.S., 
people make a big deal about people coming out and saying they're 
homosexual, you don't see the rest of us coming out and saying we're 
straight, and that doesn't that mean we're pressured to hide our feelings.
comments.author: TheGameKeeper94

comments.text:
So what if it does affect kids?  It'll show them that you don't have to 
just feel an emotional connection with people of the opposite sex.  And 
yes, homosexuality is completely normal.  If you didn't care, why make the 
comment?  What about homosexuality isn't normal to you?  Also, not everyone 
who has had sex with a member of the same sex is homosexual.  Things aren't 
black and white, and I've seen that probably the majority of people are 
born Bisexual.  Society pressures people into things.  If gay-friendly 
media is disturbing to you on some level, imagine how weird it is for 
people who are exclusively homosexual to see all this "Straight 
Propaganda".  Every Disney Princess is a man-hungry girly-girl.  And every 
knight in shining armor has his eye on the fair maiden.  Every love song on 
the radio is about straight relationships.  And entire movie franchises are 
based around a teenage boy and a teenage girl being in love and facing X 
difficulty for it.

For years homosexuality was illegal, and when they couldn't convince people 
that religion was all that was necessary to make it illegal, they declared 
it a mental disorder.  It is still punishable by death in several 
countries.  You're fine with gays being married just as long as every 
single thing is private.  Do you feel disturbed when you see a gay couple 
kissing in public?  Would you be if it was a man and his girlfriend?  Why 
is it cute to see a 10 year old to call a girl his girlfriend, knowing full 
well he probably doesn't think anything adult about it, while if he says 
his male friend is his boyfriend it's something that has to be corrected? 
 Is the idea that there will be more gay people in an accepting society 
scary to you?  Would you rather see more people pressured to hide their 
feelings and desires just so you aren't inconvenienced?  These are actual 
questions, not hate, but legitimate questions directed to you.
comments.author: Randy Rogers

comments.text: +dmcclanahan12 "Exactly chap. Spot on good sir!" (Jeremy Clarkson voice)
